question: Which country houses the "Didi Abuli Mountain"?
explanation: The Didi Abuli Mountain is located in Georgia. Didi Abuli, which forms part of the Abul-Samsari Range, is one of the highest peaks of the Lesser Caucasus Mountains in the nation of Georgia. The mountain is located in the Abul-Samsari Range at an elevation of 3,300 m above sea level. Didi Abuli is an extinct stratovolcano.
